recent-projects.title: Kindlingapp
recent-projects.description: As design lead at Kindling, I did this site redesign showcasing Kindling as a platform for discovering, sharing, and actualizing ideas.

tweets.html:
Yeh I'm biased, but the attention to design details by the @kindlingapp team is really damn impressive. Great update. http://t.co/KciQBQTmYL

— Rich Ziade (@richziade) July 19, 2013

Mission Accomplished. A prospect just said that they love @kindlingapp for its design & that a competitor "was obv. designed by engineers".

— Timothy Meaney (@timothymeaney) August 17, 2011

recent-projects.description: Landing page design for Kindling. Part of a campaign offering Kindling for free to qualifying startups.

recent-projects.description: Visualize the result of Sass color functions in real-time without compiling; a tool spawned and created in the Arc90 Lab.

recent-projects.title: CSS Off 2012
recent-projects.description: Finalist in the global web design competition where entries were meticulously judged by industry-renowned experts on code, UX, browser support, responsiveness, and more.
